1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Definition of relmap operators.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Define
6  ( rops,
7    ropAlias,
8    newCheck,
9    preCheck,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus          as K
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
15
16-- | Make implementations of relmap operators.
17rops :: C.RopGroup     -- ^ Operator group
18     -> [(C.RopCons c, [(K.AttrUsage, String)])]
19                       -- ^ Constructor and list of usage and layout
20     -> [C.Rop c]      -- ^ Operator list
21rops group def = make <$> (K.toAttrLayout K.<$$> def) where
22    make (cons, layout) =
23        let usage  = K.attrUsageString layout
24            name   = head $ words usage
25            sorter = K.attrParaBy layout
26        in C.Rop { C.ropName   = name
27                 , C.ropGroup  = group
28                 , C.ropAttr   = layout
29                 , C.ropParaze = sorter
30                 , C.ropCons   = cons }
31
32-- | Add aliases of relmap operator.
33ropAlias
34    :: [(C.RopName, C.RopName)]  -- ^ Alias and original rop names
35    -> K.Map [C.Rop c]           -- ^ Original rop list to add aliases.
36ropAlias alias rs = foldr ropAliasAdd rs alias
37
38-- | Add alias of relmap operator.
39ropAliasAdd :: (C.RopName, C.RopName) -> K.Map [C.Rop c]
40ropAliasAdd (name, orig) = loop where
41    loop [] = []
42    loop (r : rs) | C.ropName r == orig  = r { C.ropName = name } : r : rs
43                  | otherwise            = r : loop rs
44    
45-- | New term check.
46--
47--   * Target terms are not present in input terms,
48--     e.g., abort if targets are __\/a__ and inputs are __\/a \/b__.
49--   * Target terms are not duplicated,
50--     e.g., abort if targets are __\/a \/a__ and inputs are __\/a \/b__.
51--
52newCheck :: K.TermPicker c -> K.MapAb a
53newCheck pk body
54    | K.preTermsExist pk   = Msg.reqNewTerm pk input
55    | K.duplicated target  = Msg.dupTerm target
56    | otherwise            = body
57    where target = K.pkLNames pk
58          input  = K.pkRNames pk
59
60-- | Term presence check.
61--
62--   * Terget terms are present in input terms,
63--     e.g., abort if targets are __\/c__ and inputs are __\/a \/b__.
64--   * Target terms are not duplicated,
65--     e.g., abort if targets are __\/a \/a__ and inputs are __\/a \/b__.
66--
67preCheck :: K.TermPicker c -> K.MapAb a
68preCheck pk body
69    | K.newTermsExist pk   = Msg.newTerm pk input
70    | K.duplicated target  = Msg.dupTerm target
71    | otherwise            = body
72    where target = K.pkLNames pk
73          input  = K.pkRNames pk
74
